Privacy Policy for Enacle Infotech EMI Calculator

 At Enacle Infotech, we value and prioritize the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy document outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it. By using the EMI Calculator app and related services, you consent to the practices outlined in this policy.


Information Collection and Use:

 Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and other relevant details when you register or use our services. This information is used to provide personalized services and enhance your user experience.

 Usage Data: We may collect usage data, including but not limited to device information, log data, and analytics, to improve our services, troubleshoot issues, and analyze trends.


Use of Information:

 We use the information collected to provide and improve our services, personalize user experience, and communicate with users regarding updates, promotions, and important announcements. Personal information is not shared with third parties unless required by law or with your explicit consent.


Data Security:

 We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Despite our best efforts, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.


Third-Party Services:

 The EMI Calculator app may integrate third-party services such as banking APIs or insurance information. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage users to review them before providing any personal information.


Children's Privacy:

 The EMI Calculator app is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe that we have inadvertently collected information from a child, please contact us immediately, and we will take appropriate action to delete such information.


Changes to This Privacy Policy:

 We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Users will be notified of any changes through the app or via email. Continued use of the app after the changes constitute acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.


Contact Us:

 If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at contact@enacleinfotech.com.
